page.title: 23Churches in Hucknall
page.content:
Most Christian denominations are represented in Hucknall. The C of E parish includes 3 churches, with growing congregations and oversight by a Team Rector. There is a Roman Catholic Church. Non-Conformist tradition in Hucknall is strong. The Baptist Church flourishes in two worship centres. Methodist congregations have declined but are still active. Others include the Salvation Army, Pentecostals, United Reform and Assemblies of God. Churches Together in Hucknall, Linby and Papplewick is active.
David Heathcote
